name: Cross Mark
baseMeaning: A red X mark indicating rejection or cancellation.
tldr: Means no, wrong, cancelled, or rejected. The universal stop sign.

contextMeanings.meaning: Something is wrong, cancelled, or rejected.
Indicating something won't happen or isn't approved.

platformNotes.note: Popular in threads showing dos and don'ts.
Used in comparison videos showing what not to do.
Used to indicate rejection or unavailability.

generationalNotes.note: Often used emphatically to reject things.
Used in checklist style content for negatives.
Used straightforwardly to mean no or wrong.

seoTitle: ❌ Cross Mark Emoji Meaning - What Does ❌ Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the cross mark emoji ❌ really means in texting. Means no, wrong, or cancelled. Complete context guide.
